abstract: Almost any personal information is for sale online through the so-called “Bug Market,” including credit card numbers, e-mail addresses and access to computer systems.
snippet: Almost any personal information is for sale online through the so-called “Bug Market,” including credit card numbers, e-mail addresses and access to computer systems.
lead_paragraph: In an article I wrote for Monday’s newspaper, I took a look at the underground world of cybersecurity and the discussion over when security experts, or hackers, should disclose a flaw in an online system.

headline.main: What’s for Sale on the Bug Market?
